oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Extended hubbard-model in 2-dimensions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LAAD, M
GHOSH, DK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: intra-atomic attraction
valence bond state
superconductivity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The extended Hubbard model with intersite coupling has been studied by mapping it onto an XXZ model without a magnetic field for the half-filled band case. The phases in the U-Q plane obtained here are in good agreement with the Monte Carlo simulation results. Extending the analogy to away from half filling, a T(c) vs. delta phase diagram for a prototype high T(c) system is suggested.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS,104,741-742
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: INTERNATIONAL CONF ON MAGNETISM ( ICM 91 ),EDINBURGH, SCOTLAND,SEP 02-06, 1991
